rationale: Endemic to Volta basin. The extent of occurrence and area occupancy thresholds are estimated at 60,000 km² and less than 2,000 km² (over more than 10 locations), respectively. It threatened by deforestation, overfishing and invasive aquatic weeds (Water Hyacinth). It is qualified as Near Threatened as it close to meeting Vulnerable under the B2 criteria.
evaluator: Entsua-Mensah, M., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
